content: To the right, another Dragonfly Guai will try to pepper you with arrows from a high ledge, but you'll also want to check the far left corner past the archway for the Estate of the Zhu Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Estate of the Zhu'.
The content is as follows:
To the right, another Dragonfly Guai will try to pepper you with arrows from a high ledge, but you'll also want to check the far left corner past the archway for the Estate of the Zhu Shrine.
